Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) and grease a loaf pan.
Combine flour, sugar, cinnamon, baking soda, baking powder, and cloves in a large bowl.
Pour the mixture into the greased bread pan.

Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, approximately 45 to 55 minutes. Let cool in the pans for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
